channel.title: I need to know how to make my own shop in my server!
channel.description:
Plz help me make a shop and i have two questions
#1 How do I make myself a mod/owner?
#2 What is the client.java thingamajig that everybody is talking about?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 14, 2006, 03:33:35 PM[/size][hr]I have many viewers yet no repliers :confused:... tut tut hmmmmmm :| I will destroy all the things in my path in order get an answer! ;D

item.title: I need to know how to make my own shop in my server!
item.dc:creator: @Rune_PKah Rune_PKah
item.description:
@Rune_PKah wrote:

Thanx that got me from a normal player in my server to my rightful place
dun dun dun! THE OWNER CHAIR YAY!

Read full topic
item.source: I need to know how to make my own shop in my server!

item.title: I need to know how to make my own shop in my server!
item.dc:creator: @Shizo Shizo
item.description:
@Shizo wrote:

Go to the character file, search your name. open it edit the member rights in 3 and compile, run the server again YAY

Read full topic
